Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Port Alfred, The Royal Guest House is close to East Beach and Kelly's Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 12 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and an indoor pool.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Royal Guest House. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Royal Guest House. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

East Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Kelly's Beach - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Great Fish Lighthouse - 20.8 km / 12.9 mi
Kenton on Sea Beach - 23.2 km / 14.4 mi
Egazini Park - 45 km / 28 mi
Observatory Museum - 46.5 km / 28.9 mi
1820 Settlers National Monument - 46.6 km / 28.9 mi
Rhodes University - 46.6 km / 29 mi
Cathedral of St. Michael and St. George - 46.7 km / 29 mi
Albany History Museum Complex - 46.7 km / 29 mi
South African Institute for Aquatic Biodiversity - 47.1 km / 29.3 mi
African Pride Pumba Private Game Reserve - 52.5 km / 32.6 mi
Lalibela Game Reserve - 61.4 km / 38.2 mi
Amakhala Game Reserve - 73.4 km / 45.6 mi
Addo Elephant National Park - 108.1 km / 67.2 mi

The preferred airport for The Royal Guest House is Port Elizabeth (PLZ) - 126.6 km / 78.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
